Sequence Information.Target Organism: Botrytis cinerea, Coprinus comatus, Mycosphaerella arachidicola, Physalospora piricola, Candida albicans, Saccharomyces carlsbergensis, HIV-1 reverse transcriptase.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antifungal activity. Inhibits HIV-1 reverse transcriptase.
